data.eml:eml: Revision of the genus Sialis from Oriental China (Megaloptera: Sialidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Xingyue, Yang, Ding (2006): Revision of the genus Sialis from Oriental China (Megaloptera: Sialidae). Zootaxa 1108: 23-35, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.171491
